content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your electrical needs today?
Look, I just need an electrician to come out and fix my lights. Don't make me answer a bunch of questions.
I understand, and I want to get help to you as quickly as possible. To send the right person, could you please share your address?
I already called you! Don't you have my info? Just send someone now.
I want to make sure our electrician gets to the correct location. If you could provide just your street address, I can get this scheduled right away.
This is ridiculous. Every time I call, you people make it harder. Why so many questions?
I'm really sorry for the frustration. We just need your address so we can confirm you're in our service area and send someone ASAP. Could you provide your address, please?
Forget it. You aren't helpful at all.
reason: Customer refused to provide necessary information.
